amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 106 which contained criminal penalties and replace it with an ascending civil penalty structure for violations of law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 109-441 to strike the current section 106 and inserts an ascending civil penalty structure for each subsequent offense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 320 (Roll no. 117).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 320 (Roll no. 117).
